skillTree.localised_description: This vile, mutilated steed bears its rider into the very thick of battle, where any wounds scored upon its cancerous flesh are sealed by the pus weeping from its foetid body.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Rushing forth in the name of utter Ruin, Kayzk is surrounded by only the best riders in all the realms.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Kayzk the Befouled is so named because the Fly Lord has corrupted and distorted each and every aspect of his being in ways that no one can truly comprehend.

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A huge and powerful figure, Kayzk dwarfs his enemies, unmoving in the face of their every attack.
Line up the largest, most ungainly and lumbering oafs among any enemy, and Kayzk will knock them down one by one.
Always look after number one.
No retreat, no surrender. Keep cutting them down until no more rise to face you.
Sometimes mere proximity, as opposed to direct contact, is enough for Nurgle's many foul diseases to spread – so virulent are his infections and plagues.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: +10%
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Possessed as he is of a body long devoid of feeling, Kayzk is extremely difficult to bring down, let alone kill outright.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
"Harder, faster, more aggressive!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for all units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Nothing is more powerful than pure, ruthless aggression.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The rot beasts thrash and bray violently with every step – remaining steady requires more than simply holding on for dear life.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mediocrity does nothing for the Fly Lord's cause; if sickness is to spread far and wide, elite training is a necessity.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -4% for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -8% for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As the Rot Beasts' claws tear into the earth at speed, and hooves pound through mud and grime, every enemy of Nurgle recoils in fear.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Terror for Cavalry and Chariot units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: To each of his Chieftains Tamurkhan granted a powerful talisman, to enhance their power, but also to yoke it to his own through Nurgle's immense will.

item_set.name: Befouled Blessings
item_set.description: Only the Urfather's children can truly appreciate His many miraculous blessings and boons.

items.colour_text: The meagre runts ignominiously cleaved in two will never know the defilement brought on by the debilitating wave of Nurgle's will... which may be a mercy to most!

item_set.name: Befouled Blessings
item_set.description: Only the Urfather's children can truly appreciate His many miraculous blessings and boons.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: As possibly the most blessed of all Grandfather's favoured, Kayzk long ago lost all form and feeling, which has given him a certain physical resilience.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
